{"label":"T.SAY( `bring ${a big book}` ),\nH.SAY( `search ${a big book}` ),\nM.LOOK( \"around\" ),\nM.LOOK( \"at book1\" ),\nJ.SAY( ''found'' ),\nH.SAY( \"fetch the book'' ),\nM.GO( ''to shelf1'' ),\nM.REACH( ''book1'' ),\nM.GRASP( ''book1'' ),\nM.UNREACH(),\nM.GO( ''to modelPosition'' ),\nH.CHOOSE(\"help\")", "category":"TextLabels_Size2", "size":"432 502", "key":246, "location":"-1600 -320.1", "alignment":"0 0.5 0 0", "alignmentFocus":"0 0.5 0 0"},
{"label":"T.say( \"bring the big book\" ),\nH.search( \"the book\" ),\nM.look( \"around\" ),\nM.look( \"at book1\" ),\nJ.say( ''found'' ),\nH.say( \"fetch the book'' ),\nM.go( ''to shelf1'' ),\nM.reach( ''book1'' ),\nM.grasp( ''book1'' ),\nM.unreach(),\nM.go( ''to modelPosition'' ),\n()=> answer = true", "category":"TextLabels_Size2", "size":"432 502", "key":247, "location":"-2660 -1490", "alignment":"0 0.5 0 0", "alignmentFocus":"0 0.5 0 0"},
